mapper.select:
WITH ULT_ONLY AS ( SELECT * FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST MDB_HCP_MST_SUB WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST_SUB WHERE MDB_HCP_MST_SUB.DCF_ISHI_CD = HCP_MST_SUB.ULT_DOC_NO ) ) --サブクエリ用 武田側
, TKD_INS_NAME AS ( SELECT DISTINCT HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,NVL(LISTAGG(HCO_MST.INS_ABBR_NAME || '(' || HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_KJ || ':' || HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_KJ || ')', CHR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (order by null),'') INS_NAME FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_WORK.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' GROUP BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO ORDER BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO ) --サブクエリ用 ULT側 ,ULT_INS_NAME AS ( SELECT DISTINCT MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ,NVL(LISTAGG(MDB_HCO_MST.SHISETSU_NM || '(' || HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEPT_KJ || ':' || HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.TITLE_KJ || ')', CHR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (order by null),'') INS_NAME FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST MDB_HCP_MST LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI ON MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.DCF_ISHI_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCO_MST MDB_HCO_MST ON MDB_HCO_MST.DCF_SHISETSU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.SHOZOKU_BUKA_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.SHOZOKUBUKA_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEPT_CODE = HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.YAKUSHOKU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.YAKUSHOKU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.TITLE_CODE = HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' GROUP BY MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ORDER BY MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ) SELECT DISTINCT MAX(HCP_MST.DOC_KANJ) DOC_KANJ ,MAX(HCP_MST.DOC_KANA) DOC_KANA ,HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,MAX(NVL2(HCP_MST.DOB_YYYY,HCP_MST.DOB_YYYY || '/' || HCP_MST.DOB_MM || '/' || HCP_MST.DOB_DD, '')) DOB ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_KJ) UNIV_KJ ,MAX(HCP_MST.GRAD_YEAR) GRAD_YEAR ,MAX(ISHI_KBN.VALUE1_KANJ) VALUE1_KANJ ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_KJ) IKYOKU_KJ ,MAX(REPLACE(TKD_INS_NAME.INS_NAME,'(:)','')) INS_NAME ,MAX(HCP_MST.OLD_KANJ_SEI) OLD_KANJ_SEI ,MAX(MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM) ISHI_NM ,MAX(MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM_KANA) ISHI_NM_KANA ,MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ,MAX(NVL2(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,SUBSTR(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,1,4) || '/' || SUBSTR(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,5,2) || '/' || SUBSTR(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,7,2) ,'')) ULT_DOB ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.UNIV_KJ) ULT_UNIV_KJ ,MAX(MDB_HCP_MST.SOTSUNEN_SR) SOTSUNEN_SR ,MAX(REPLACE(ULT_INS_NAME.INS_NAME,'(:)','')) ULT_INS_NAME ,MAX(CASE WHEN HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NULL AND MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SHINKI_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS HENSHU_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS FUKKATSU_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN JKR_SOS_ADDR.SOS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MR_SHINKI_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN INS_DOC_TRT_MR.JGI_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MR_KOUSHIN_FLG FROM M_RDM_PARAM_MST PARAM_MST INNER JOIN ( SELECT DOC_NO, ULT_DOC_NO FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST
UNION
SELECT NULL AS DOC_NO, DCF_ISHI_CD AS ULT_DOC_NO FROM ULT_ONLY ) TKD_ULT ON PARAM_MST.PARAM_NAME = 'MN_DOC' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST ON HCP_MST.DOC_NO = TKD_ULT.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST MDB_HCP_MST ON MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD = TKD_ULT.ULT_DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT INS_DOC_TRT ON INS_DOC_TRT.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JGI_SOS_MST JGI_SOS_MST ON JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_WORK.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI ON MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.DCF_ISHI_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCO_MST MDB_HCO_MST ON MDB_HCO_MST.DCF_SHISETSU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_CODE = HCP_MST.MED_SCH AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST ON SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST.SHUSSHINKO_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.SHUSSHINKO_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.UNIV_CODE = SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST.UNIV_CODE AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_CODE = HCP_MST.H_UNIV AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.SHOZOKU_BUKA_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.SHOZOKUBUKA_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEPT_CODE = HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.YAKUSHOKU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.YAKUSHOKU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.TITLE_CODE = HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN TKD_INS_NAME ON TKD_INS_NAME.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN ULT_INS_NAME ON ULT_INS_NAME.DCF_ISHI_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST ISHI_KBN ON ISHI_KBN.CODE_NAME = 'DOC_TYPE' AND ISHI_KBN.DEL_FLG = '0' AND ISHI_KBN.VALUE1 = HCP_MST.DOC_TYPE LEFT JOIN COM_POS_ADDR POS_ADDR ON POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_PREF = MDB_HCO_MST.TODOFUKEN_CD AND POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_CITY = MDB_HCO_MST.SHIKUCHOSON_CD LEFT JOIN S_RDM_JKR_SOS_ADDR JKR_SOS_ADDR ON JKR_SOS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_PREF = POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_PREF AND JKR_SOS_ADDR.TK_CITY_CD = POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_CITY AND JKR_SOS_ADDR.SOS_CD = #{inSosCd} LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT INS_DOC_TRT_MR ON INS_DOC_TRT_MR.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO AND INS_DOC_TRT_MR.JGI_NO = #{inJgiNo} 1 = 1 --1 氏名漢字(全角)※ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_KANJI_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanjiSrch} || '%' OR MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanjiSrch} || '%') --2 氏名カナ(半角カナ)※ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_KANA_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanaSrch} || '%' OR MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM_KANA_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanaSrch} || '%') --3 医師／薬剤師区分 AND (HCP_MST.DOC_TYPE = #{inDocType}) --4 医師固定C AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO = #{inDocNo}) --5 ULT医師コード AND (MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD = #{inDcfIshiCd}) --6 医師属性 AND HCP_MST.DOC_ATTRIBUTE = #{inDocAttribute} --7 出身校 AND (HCP_MST.MED_SCH = #{inMedSch} OR SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST.UNIV_CODE = #{inMedSch}) --8 卒年 AND (HCP_MST.GRAD_YEAR = #{inGradYear} OR MDB_HCP_MST.SOTSUNEN_SR = #{inGradYear}) --9 出身医局校 AND (HCP_MST.H_UNIV = #{inHUniv}) --10 ULT接続が武田情報のみ AND (MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD IS NULL) --10 ULT接続がULT情報のみ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NULL) --10 ULT接続が武田-ULT接続済み AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD IS NOT NULL) --11 組織選択 AND (JGI_SOS_MST.UP_SOS_CD = #{inGmnSosCd}) AND (JGI_SOS_MST.SOS_CD = #{inGmnSosCd}) --12 担当者選択 AND (JGI_SOS_MST.BR_CODE = #{inGmnBrCode} AND JGI_SOS_MST.DIST_CODE = #{inGmnDistCode} AND INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO = #{inGmnJgiNo}) --13 施設固定C AND (HCO_MST.INS_NO = #{inInsNo}) --14 所属部科コード AND (HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE = #{inDeptCode} OR HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.DEPT_CODE = #{inDeptCode}) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST DEL_HCP_MST WHERE 1 = 1 AND HCP_MST.DOC_NO = DEL_HCP_MST.DOC_NO AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = '1' AND HCP_MST.DEL_REASON = '02') --削除理由 重複登録除き(ULT側) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST DEL_MDB_HCP_MST WHERE 1 = 1 AND MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD = DEL_MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD AND MDB_HCP_MST.SHUSEI_KBN = 'C' AND MDB_HCP_MST.SAKUJYO_YOTEI_RIYU_CD = '5')
GROUP BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO,MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD --ソートID NULL OR '0' ORDER BY DOC_KANA NULLS FIRST --ソートID '1' ORDER BY DOC_KANA DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '2' ORDER BY DOC_KANJ NULLS FIRST --ソートID '3' ORDER BY DOC_KANJ DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '4' ORDER BY DOC_NO NULLS FIRST --ソートID '5' ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '6' ORDER BY ISHI_NM NULLS FIRST --ソートID '7' ORDER BY ISHI_NM DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '8' ORDER BY ISHI_NM_KANA NULLS FIRST --ソートID '9' ORDER BY ISHI_NM_KANA DESC NULLS LAST OFFSET #{inOffset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{inLimit} ROWS ONLY

select count(*) CNT_HCP from ( WITH ULT_ONLY AS ( SELECT * FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST MDB_HCP_MST_SUB WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST_SUB WHERE MDB_HCP_MST_SUB.DCF_ISHI_CD = HCP_MST_SUB.ULT_DOC_NO ) ) --サブクエリ用 武田側
, TKD_INS_NAME AS ( SELECT DISTINCT HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,NVL(LISTAGG(HCO_MST.INS_ABBR_NAME || '(' || HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_KJ || ':' || HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_KJ || ')', CHR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (order by null),'') INS_NAME FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_WORK.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' GROUP BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO ORDER BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO ) --サブクエリ用 ULT側 ,ULT_INS_NAME AS ( SELECT DISTINCT MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ,NVL(LISTAGG(MDB_HCO_MST.SHISETSU_NM || '(' || HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEPT_KJ || ':' || HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.TITLE_KJ || ')', CHR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (order by null),'') INS_NAME FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST MDB_HCP_MST LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI ON MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.DCF_ISHI_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCO_MST MDB_HCO_MST ON MDB_HCO_MST.DCF_SHISETSU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.SHOZOKU_BUKA_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.SHOZOKUBUKA_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEPT_CODE = HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.YAKUSHOKU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.YAKUSHOKU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.TITLE_CODE = HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' GROUP BY MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ORDER BY MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ) SELECT DISTINCT MAX(HCP_MST.DOC_KANJ) DOC_KANJ ,MAX(HCP_MST.DOC_KANA) DOC_KANA ,HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,MAX(NVL2(HCP_MST.DOB_YYYY,HCP_MST.DOB_YYYY || '/' || HCP_MST.DOB_MM || '/' || HCP_MST.DOB_DD, '')) DOB ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_KJ) UNIV_KJ ,MAX(HCP_MST.GRAD_YEAR) GRAD_YEAR ,MAX(ISHI_KBN.VALUE1_KANJ) VALUE1_KANJ ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_KJ) IKYOKU_KJ ,MAX(REPLACE(TKD_INS_NAME.INS_NAME,'(:)','')) INS_NAME ,MAX(HCP_MST.OLD_KANJ_SEI) OLD_KANJ_SEI ,MAX(MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM) ISHI_NM ,MAX(MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM_KANA) ISHI_NM_KANA ,MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD ,MAX(NVL2(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,SUBSTR(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,1,4) || '/' || SUBSTR(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,5,2) || '/' || SUBSTR(MDB_HCP_MST.SEINENGAPPI_SR,7,2) ,'')) ULT_DOB ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.UNIV_KJ) ULT_UNIV_KJ ,MAX(MDB_HCP_MST.SOTSUNEN_SR) SOTSUNEN_SR ,MAX(REPLACE(ULT_INS_NAME.INS_NAME,'(:)','')) ULT_INS_NAME ,MAX(CASE WHEN HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NULL AND MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SHINKI_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS HENSHU_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS FUKKATSU_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN JKR_SOS_ADDR.SOS_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MR_SHINKI_FLG ,MAX(CASE WHEN INS_DOC_TRT_MR.JGI_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MR_KOUSHIN_FLG FROM M_RDM_PARAM_MST PARAM_MST INNER JOIN ( SELECT DOC_NO, ULT_DOC_NO FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST
UNION
SELECT NULL AS DOC_NO, DCF_ISHI_CD AS ULT_DOC_NO FROM ULT_ONLY ) TKD_ULT ON PARAM_MST.PARAM_NAME = 'MN_DOC' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST ON HCP_MST.DOC_NO = TKD_ULT.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST MDB_HCP_MST ON MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD = TKD_ULT.ULT_DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT INS_DOC_TRT ON INS_DOC_TRT.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JGI_SOS_MST JGI_SOS_MST ON JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_WORK.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI ON MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.DCF_ISHI_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN T_RDM_M_MDB_HCO_MST MDB_HCO_MST ON MDB_HCO_MST.DCF_SHISETSU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.KINMUSAKI_SHISETSU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_CODE = HCP_MST.MED_SCH AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST ON SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST.SHUSSHINKO_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.SHUSSHINKO_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.UNIV_CODE = SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST.UNIV_CODE AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_ULT_DOC.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_CODE = HCP_MST.H_UNIV AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.SHOZOKU_BUKA_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.SHOZOKUBUKA_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEPT_CODE = HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.YAKUSHOKU_CD = MDB_HCP_KINMUSAKI.YAKUSHOKU_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.TITLE_CODE = HCP_YAKUSHOKU_LNK_MST.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_ULT.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN TKD_INS_NAME ON TKD_INS_NAME.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN ULT_INS_NAME ON ULT_INS_NAME.DCF_ISHI_CD = MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST ISHI_KBN ON ISHI_KBN.CODE_NAME = 'DOC_TYPE' AND ISHI_KBN.DEL_FLG = '0' AND ISHI_KBN.VALUE1 = HCP_MST.DOC_TYPE LEFT JOIN COM_POS_ADDR POS_ADDR ON POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_PREF = MDB_HCO_MST.TODOFUKEN_CD AND POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_CITY = MDB_HCO_MST.SHIKUCHOSON_CD LEFT JOIN S_RDM_JKR_SOS_ADDR JKR_SOS_ADDR ON JKR_SOS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_PREF = POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_PREF AND JKR_SOS_ADDR.TK_CITY_CD = POS_ADDR.ADDR_CODE_CITY AND JKR_SOS_ADDR.SOS_CD = #{inSosCd} LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT INS_DOC_TRT_MR ON INS_DOC_TRT_MR.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO AND INS_DOC_TRT_MR.JGI_NO = #{inJgiNo} 1 = 1 --1 氏名漢字(全角)※ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_KANJI_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanjiSrch} || '%' OR MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanjiSrch} || '%') --2 氏名カナ(半角カナ)※ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_KANA_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanaSrch} || '%' OR MDB_HCP_MST.ISHI_NM_KANA_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanaSrch} || '%') --3 医師／薬剤師区分 AND (HCP_MST.DOC_TYPE = #{inDocType}) --4 医師固定C AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO = #{inDocNo}) --5 ULT医師コード AND (MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD = #{inDcfIshiCd}) --6 医師属性 AND HCP_MST.DOC_ATTRIBUTE = #{inDocAttribute} --7 出身校 AND (HCP_MST.MED_SCH = #{inMedSch} OR SHUSSHINKO_LNK_MST.UNIV_CODE = #{inMedSch}) --8 卒年 AND (HCP_MST.GRAD_YEAR = #{inGradYear} OR MDB_HCP_MST.SOTSUNEN_SR = #{inGradYear}) --9 出身医局校 AND (HCP_MST.H_UNIV = #{inHUniv}) --10 ULT接続が武田情報のみ AND (MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD IS NULL) --10 ULT接続がULT情報のみ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NULL) --10 ULT接続が武田-ULT接続済み AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD IS NOT NULL) --11 組織選択 AND (JGI_SOS_MST.UP_SOS_CD = #{inGmnSosCd}) AND (JGI_SOS_MST.SOS_CD = #{inGmnSosCd}) --12 担当者選択 AND (JGI_SOS_MST.BR_CODE = #{inGmnBrCode} AND JGI_SOS_MST.DIST_CODE = #{inGmnDistCode} AND INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO = #{inGmnJgiNo}) --13 施設固定C AND (HCO_MST.INS_NO = #{inInsNo}) --14 所属部科コード AND (HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE = #{inDeptCode} OR HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_LNK_MST.DEPT_CODE = #{inDeptCode}) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST DEL_HCP_MST WHERE 1 = 1 AND HCP_MST.DOC_NO = DEL_HCP_MST.DOC_NO AND HCP_MST.DEL_FLG = '1' AND HCP_MST.DEL_REASON = '02') --削除理由 重複登録除き(ULT側) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM T_RDM_M_MDB_HCP_MST DEL_MDB_HCP_MST WHERE 1 = 1 AND MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD = DEL_MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD AND MDB_HCP_MST.SHUSEI_KBN = 'C' AND MDB_HCP_MST.SAKUJYO_YOTEI_RIYU_CD = '5')
GROUP BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO,MDB_HCP_MST.DCF_ISHI_CD --ソートID NULL OR '0' ORDER BY DOC_KANA NULLS FIRST --ソートID '1' ORDER BY DOC_KANA DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '2' ORDER BY DOC_KANJ NULLS FIRST --ソートID '3' ORDER BY DOC_KANJ DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '4' ORDER BY DOC_NO NULLS FIRST --ソートID '5' ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '6' ORDER BY ISHI_NM NULLS FIRST --ソートID '7' ORDER BY ISHI_NM DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '8' ORDER BY ISHI_NM_KANA NULLS FIRST --ソートID '9' ORDER BY ISHI_NM_KANA DESC NULLS LAST ) SELECT_HCP
SELECT HCP_MST.DOC_NO FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST INNER JOIN T_RDM_HCP_REQ HCP_REQ ON HCP_MST.DOC_NO = HCP_REQ.DOC_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND HCP_MST.DOC_NO = #{inDocNo} AND HCP_REQ.DOC_ATTRIBUTE = '3'

WITH TKD_INS_NAME AS (--サブクエリ用 SELECT HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,NVL(LISTAGG(HCO_MST.INS_ABBR_NAME || '(' || HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_KJ || ':' || HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_KJ || ')', CHR(10)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY NULL),'') INS_NAME FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_WORK.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' GROUP BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO )
SELECT /*+ OPT_PARAM('_COMPLEX_VIEW_MERGING','FALSE') */ COUNT(*) AS REC_CNT FROM (
SELECT MAX(HCP_MST.DOC_KANJ) AS DOC_KANJ ,MAX(HCP_MST.DOC_KANA) AS DOC_KANA ,HCP_MST.DOC_NO ,MAX(NVL2(HCP_MST.DOB_YYYY,HCP_MST.DOB_YYYY || '/' || HCP_MST.DOB_MM || '/' || HCP_MST.DOB_DD, '')) AS DOB ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_KJ) AS UNIV_KJ ,MAX(HCP_MST.GRAD_YEAR) AS GRAD_YEAR ,MAX(HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_KJ) IKYOKU_KJ ,MAX(ISHI_KBN.VALUE1_KANJ) AS DOC_KBN_NM ,MAX(REPLACE(TKD_INS_NAME.INS_NAME,'(:)','')) INS_NAME ,MAX(HCP_MST.OLD_KANJ_SEI) OLD_KANJ_SEI FROM M_RDM_HCP_MST HCP_MST LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JKR_MR_INS_DOC_TRT INS_DOC_TRT ON INS_DOC_TRT.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_JGI_SOS_MST JGI_SOS_MST ON JGI_SOS_MST.JGI_NO = INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_WORK HCP_WORK ON HCP_WORK.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCO_MST HCO_MST ON HCO_MST.INS_NO = HCP_WORK.INS_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_CODE = HCP_MST.MED_SCH AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_DOC.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHUSSHINKO HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU ON HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_CODE = HCP_MST.H_UNIV AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.UNIV_FLG = '1' AND HCP_SHUSSHINKO_TKD_IKYOKU.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD ON HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEPT_CODE = HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE AND HCP_SHOZOKU_BUKA_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M_RDM_HCP_YAKUSHOKU HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD ON HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.TITLE_CODE = HCP_WORK.TITLE_CODE AND HCP_YAKUSHOKU_TKD.DEL_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN TKD_INS_NAME ON TKD_INS_NAME.DOC_NO = HCP_MST.DOC_NO LEFT JOIN M_RDM_CODE_MST ISHI_KBN ON ISHI_KBN.CODE_NAME = 'DOC_TYPE' AND ISHI_KBN.DEL_FLG = '0' AND ISHI_KBN.VALUE1 = HCP_MST.DOC_TYPE WHERE 1 = 1 --1 氏名漢字(全角)※ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_KANJI_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanjiSrch} || '%') --2 氏名カナ(半角カナ)※ AND (HCP_MST.DOC_KANA_SRCH like '%' || #{inKanaSrch} || '%') --3 医師／薬剤師区分 AND (HCP_MST.DOC_TYPE = #{inDocType}) --4 医師固定C AND (HCP_MST.DOC_NO = #{inDocNo}) --6 医師属性 AND HCP_MST.DOC_ATTRIBUTE = #{inDocAttribute} --7 出身校 AND (HCP_MST.MED_SCH = #{inMedSch}) --8 卒年 AND (HCP_MST.GRAD_YEAR = #{inGradYear}) --9 出身医局校 AND (HCP_MST.H_UNIV = #{inHUniv}) --11 組織選択 AND (JGI_SOS_MST.UP_SOS_CD = #{inGmnSosCd}) AND (JGI_SOS_MST.SOS_CD = #{inGmnSosCd}) --12 担当者選択 AND (INS_DOC_TRT.JGI_NO = #{inGmnJgiNo}) --13 施設固定C AND (HCO_MST.INS_NO = #{inInsNo}) --14 所属部科コード AND (HCP_WORK.DEPT_CODE = #{inDeptCode})
GROUP BY HCP_MST.DOC_NO
)
--ソートID NULL OR '0' ORDER BY DOC_KANA NULLS FIRST --ソートID '1' ORDER BY DOC_KANA DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '2' ORDER BY DOC_KANJ NULLS FIRST --ソートID '3' ORDER BY DOC_KANJ DESC NULLS LAST --ソートID '4' ORDER BY DOC_NO NULLS FIRST --ソートID '5' ORDER BY DOC_NO DESC NULLS LAST
OFFSET #{inOffset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{inLimit} ROWS ONLY
